page.title: 10A CAUSE FOR CONCERN
page.content: The main cause for concern amongst the community is unemployment, but of course this is also a national concern. On the opposite bank of the Severn Estuary is the Berkley Nuclear Reactor which causes concern about pollution. There is fear in the community that this could be the cause of leukemia amongst children in the locality. The increasing flow and speed of heavy traffic on the A48 road which runs through the centre of the village perturbs some residents. Poor street lighting was also cause for concern.
